Good Evening! I want to begin by thanking [Michigan Christian Grads] for
inviting me to participate in tonight’s debate. And I want to say what a
privilege it is to be debating so eminent a scholar as Professor Curley. When
I was a doctoral student writing my dissertation on the cosmological argu-
ment  for  God’s  existence,  Dr.  Curley’s  work  on  the  famous  philosopher
Benedict  de  Spinoza  was  a  valuable  resource  to  me  in  trying  to  a
